verses.roman:
rātri-kāle rāya punaḥ kaila āgamana
dui jane kṛṣṇa-kathāya kaila jāgaraṇa

synonyms: rātri-kāle—at night; rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; punaḥ—again; kaila—did; āgamana—coming; dui jane—the two of them; kṛṣṇa-kathāya—in discourses on topics of Kṛṣṇa; kaila—did; jāgaraṇa—keeping awake through the night.
translation: Śrī Rāmānanda Rāya returned at night, and he and the Lord discussed topics concerning Kṛṣṇa. Thus they passed the night.
